title: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: The close button in the Navigator view moves down when the view is resized to a smaller size on Linux, running build 20011127 (this issue does not occur on build 20011116 on Nt2000).
OB: When the Navigator view is resized smaller on Linux, the close button moves below the label.
EB: The close button should remain aligned with the label when the Navigator view is resized to a smaller size on Linux.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the Navigator view. 
2. Resize the view to a smaller size. 
3. Observe the position of the close button and its alignment with the label.
